|| [BrainRegionFBA_HP_NI FBA.HP.NI] || Incertus Nucleus || nucleus || Behavioural activation and the response to stress || Modulating influences on prefrontal and hippocampal<BR>cortical activity, midline behavior control;<BR>modulatory nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionFBA_HP_RP_LI FBA.HP.RP.LI] || Nucleus Linearis || nucleus || Release of 5-HT was only obtained on stimulation of this nucleus || Does not project to CR, but to forebrain ||
|| [BrainRegionFBA_HP_RP_MRN FBA.HP.RP.MRN] || Superior Central Raphe Nucleus || nucleus || Hallucinations || Insomnia; inhibitory nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionFBA_HP_RP_PRN FBA.HP.RP.PRN] || Pontine Raphe Nucleus || nucleus || Regulation of sleep cycle || Projects to CR, forebrain; inhibitory nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionFBA_MM_CNF FBA.MM.CNF] || Cuneiform Nucleus || nucleus || Passive coping strategy to novel, painful or threatening stimuli || modulatory nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionFBA_MM_PAG FBA.MM.PAG] || Periaqueductal Gray Matter || nucleus || Descending modulation of pain and in defensive behaviour || if there is a lesion in the PAG, then consciousness<BR>is lost; electrical stimulation of the PAG results<BR>in immediate and profound analgesia; modulatory<BR>nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionFBA_MM_RP_DRN FBA.MM.RP.DRN] || Dorsal Raphe Nucleus || nucleus || Regulation of sleep and mood || Major source of 5HT; inhibitory nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionFBA_MM_RP_MRN FBA.MM.RP.MRN] || Median Raphe Nucleus || nucleus || Block or temporarily suspend mnemonic processes in the hippocampus || Directs HC to disregard insignificant events;<BR>inhibitory nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionFBA_MM_VTA FBA.MM.VTA] || Ventral Tegmental Area || nucleus || Respond to novel stimuli, unexpected rewards, and reward predictive sensory cues ||  ||
